description: Design a new game mechanic from a high-level request
input: Design a crafting system where players combine materials found in the world to create gear. It should have recipe discovery and quality tiers.
expected_behavior: Produces a mechanic specification with player-facing description, technical spec (parameters, formulas), state machine for crafting flow, system interactions (economy, progression, UI), and edge cases. Flags items for balancer review.
rubric: Documents system interactions with other mechanics
Identifies edge cases and exploit potential

description: Analyze how a new mechanic interacts with existing systems
input: How would adding a dodge-roll mechanic interact with our existing combat, stamina, and armor systems?
expected_behavior: Produces an interaction analysis showing how dodge-roll connects to stamina (resource cost), combat (i-frames, cancellation), and armor (alternative to mitigation). Uses interaction matrix format. Identifies potential conflicts and emergent behavior.

description: Create a state machine for a game mechanic
input: Spec out the state machine for an NPC shopkeeper who has idle, greeting, trading, and farewell states.
expected_behavior: Produces a state machine with states, transitions, triggers, guard conditions, and a mermaid diagram. Includes on-enter and on-exit effects for each state.
rubric: All states have entry and exit conditions
